de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Class SpanAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.SpanAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeAdapter

    public class SpanAdapter
extends Object
implements TypeAdapter
    A class that is used to create Brat Span to CAS and vice-versa
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

    • Method Detail

      • setSingleTokenBehavior

        public void setSingleTokenBehavior(boolean aSingleTokenBehavior)
        Span can only be made on a single token (not multiple tokens), e.g. for POS or Lemma annotations. If this is set and a span is made across multiple tokens, then one annotation of the specified type will be created for each token. If this is not set, a single annotation covering all tokens is created.

      • isSingleTokenBehavior

        public boolean isSingleTokenBehavior()
        See Also:
        setSingleTokenBehavior(boolean)

      • getLabelPrefix

        public String getLabelPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: TypeAdapter
        Prefix of the label value for Brat to make sure that different annotation types can use the same label, e.g. a POS tag "N" and a named entity type "N". This is used to differentiate the different types in the brat annotation/visualization.
        Specified by:
        getLabelPrefix in interface TypeAdapter
